translated: Albrecht Dürer (or Albert Durer, in French) is a painter, engraver and German mathematician, born May 21, 1471 and died in 1528 in Nuremberg.
original: Albrecht Dürer (ou Albert Dürer, en français) est un peintre, graveur et mathématicien allemand, né le 21 mai 1471 et mort en 1528, à Nuremberg.
